author: dlr
msg: General cleanup, and closer alignment with Merge Tracking conventions.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_util/merge-info-sqlite-index.c
(index_path_merge_info): Rename MINFOSTRING parameter to
MERGEINFO_STR, and adjust doc string accorindgly.  Rename local
variables "minfo" to "mergeinfo", and "revlist" to "rangelist".
(index_txn_merge_info): Remove unused parameter TXN, and move DB
parameter to the first position in the list.  Rename MINFOPROPS to
MERGEINFO_FOR_PATHS.  Adjust doc string accordingly.  Remove
unnecessary local variables, and rename others as above.
(svn_fs_merge_info__update_index): Rename MERGEINFO to
MERGEINFO_FOR_PATHS.  Adjust doc string accordingly.  Tweak inline
comment which refers to FSFS.

author: dlr
msg: Tweak formatting.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_util/merge-info-sqlite-index.c
(util_sqlite_exec): Remove unnecessary line break.

author: dlr
msg: * subversion/libsvn_fs_util/merge-info-sqlite-index.c
(index_path_merge_info): Switch the order of the fields in the
INSERT statement which pushes records into the "mergeinfo" table to
match that of its CREATE statement (and of the results from queries

author: lgo
msg: Follow up to r24892. Fix test relocate_deleted_missing_copied: when committing
a copied directory 'svn commit' should only show the copied directory as being
added, not all of its children too.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/switch_tests.py
(relocate_deleted_missing_copied): remove H2's children from the expected
commit output.

author: dlr
msg: * notes/merge-tracking.txt
Update the status of the "Allow for merge info which contains empty
merge info for a path" task, and remove "Fix issue #2769", which has
been fixed (mostly).
